description: Touch screens have simplified technology, but there has yet to be a way to capture the precision of a calligrapher or the stroke of an artist. Not only should it meet your needs, but a stylus should have style. We would like to fix that. Introducing Jot, the stylus the world has been looking for.
title: Adonit Jot Classic Fine Point Stylus for iPad, iPhone, iPod, Kindle Fire and Other Touch Screen Tablets - Red
